pages.text: Bad Eagles are flying criatures that it can be found in mountain biomes.$(br2)You can tame this creatures, for that you will need to feed them with $(l:patchouli:mobs/alexsmobs/blobfish)Fish Oil$(/l).$(br2)Like other tameable creatures they can be commanded to follow, stay and wander, but, they can also be used for falconry with the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/falconry_glove)Falconry Glove$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/falconry_hood)Falconry Hood$(/l).
A tamed eagle can be healed with any fish. Bald Eagles can be bred with rotten flesh.
